content: Awesome pointers! Design Ethics are a must….for a humane world. I like how you put values higher than impulses in creating solutions. That puts more weight on ensuring one’s offering (service/ product) is that much more needed and not just slyly hawked around with impressive yet superficial garbs. That’s the most ideal scenario however. Its the absence of such ethics in the non-digital world that we have colas and chips doing big business while we know they vie for impulsive cravings for selfish motives. Unfortunately these old models have shaped internet businesses too. Time to wake up to these manipulative ways and be a conscious consumer of content and a judicious spender of this new currency called time!
